title: Architect Designed 3 storeyed Large House With 6 Bed Room 4 Bath Rooms On Galle Rd. -45 Mn.
details:
This Large 3 Storeyed House is Situated In Mountlavinia & It is the 2 nd Block From Galle Rd , In a 15 Ft. Wide Private Lane. Also Less than 200 Meters From Mountlavinia City Centre.

This Solidly Built 3000 Sq. Ft. House Comprise With 6 Spacious Bed Rooms & 4 Bath Rooms . Land Extent is 12 Perches. Large Sitting & Dinning Areas On Ground Floor. Fitted Pantry & Wet Kitchen. Maids Room & Bath Room Seperate. Also With Automated Gate & 2 Vehicle Parking. Large Roof Terrace . House is Approximately 12 Yrs. Old. Property Has a Commercial Value Being the 2 nd . Block From Galle Rd.
Location retains the value of peaceful living while being conveniently close to shops, schools, supermarkets, hospitals, banks, restaurants and transport.

Price Quoted above is as indicated by the Owner.
NB: Genuine buyers are encouraged & invited to make reasonable offers after inspection of the Property irrespective of the Price Quoted. Since the Sale will take place at the Best Offer Received.
